---
title: "Data Import"
output: github_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a data set.

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update the names in 'litters_df'.

```{r}
litters_df =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at your data

```{r}
litters_df
```

Sometimes skimming the data is neat
Look at your data

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""))
```

FAS_pups

```{r}
pups_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv", 
           skip = 3,
           na = c("NA", ".", ""))

pups_df
```
